alert.note: Alert for Northern Calcasieu; Southern Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 4:44PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Calcasieu Parish through 515 PM CDT... At 443 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Carlyss, or near Sulphur, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake Charles, Sulphur, Lake Charles Regional Airport, Carlyss and Edgerly. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 11 and 24. Interstate 210 between mile markers 2 and 4. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
